Sentencas: Chromium(Cr) poisoning of the traditional LSM cathode is one of the most critical issues that accounts for instability of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Thermal Stress Analysis of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Chromium Poisoning Cathodes

Sentencas: The poisoning course will introduce alien species in the cathode active regions and it causes phase change and structure deformation, reducing the sites for electrochemical reactions.
Titulo: Thermal Stress Analysis of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Chromium Poisoning Cathodes

Sentencas: A 3D model is thus developed by coupling the computational fluid dynamics (CFD) approach with the finite element method to unravel the involved electrochemical processes in chromium poisoning of SOFCs.
Titulo: Thermal Stress Analysis of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Chromium Poisoning Cathodes

Sentencas: A function is proposed based on the experimental results to describe the distribution of Cr-related compounds in cathode.
Titulo: Thermal Stress Analysis of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Chromium Poisoning Cathodes

Sentencas: The results indicate that chromium poisoning can induce a dramatic decrease in the electric current density, which can also lead to increase of activation polarizations and lower the temperature.
Titulo: Thermal Stress Analysis of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Chromium Poisoning Cathodes

Sentencas: Three kinds of thermal stresses are strongly affected by the invasion of chromium into cathodes, which are all significantly reduced with the poisoning extent.
Titulo: Thermal Stress Analysis of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Chromium Poisoning Cathodes

Sentencas: The resulting conclusions are beneficial to deeply understand the Cr poisoning of SOFCs and also to material design to prevent cathodes from Cr-based interconnect attack.
Titulo: Thermal Stress Analysis of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Chromium Poisoning Cathodes
